topic.title: HP Helion OpenStack Carrier Grade 2.0: Viewing a Virtual Machine Log

body.p: You can launch the console log for a virtual machine instance directly through the Horizon interface.

ol.li: Launch the HP Helion OpenStack Horizon Dashboard.
Select the appropriate region and project.

Based on whether you are working on a project or the domain:
Click the Admin dashboard, then the System panel, then the Instances tab.
Click the Project dashboard, then the Compute panel, then the Instances tab.

In the Instances table, for the instance you want to pause, click Edit Instance then Log.
Console logs can be viewed directly on compute server at /var/lib/nova/instances/<instance_id>/console.log.
